website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-collapse design great for small to medium dogs.
pros: Most felt this product was well made and appreciated the design and functionality of this model
We love that it can expand to different sizes and collapses easily for portability
cons: Some felt it wasn't as large as expected
some experienced it wearing quickly or materials not holding up well

customer_reviews.title: Fell Apart
customer_reviews.text: Bowl fell apart on second use. Top ring came completely off. Then second and third rings began to separate. We were traveling and needed the bowl for water and food, very disappointed!! We have had other collapsible products before ( a funnel etc) that never did this. Sad!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: A company that stand behind their product
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this bowl a 2-star review. I liked the bowl, but it started cracking and falling apart within a couple of months. Within a week of writing the review, a new bowl appeared in my mailbox. I did not contact them. This is a company that stands behind their product. This time I'll register appropriately with them because the bowl is wonderful for hiking and walks.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Would have given minus stars if I could. We bought this in April 2018. Oct 2018 falls apart. Horrible product. From the start this bowl is flimsy. We had another one that lasted years, but wear& tear finally had it’s way with it. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Cas

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bowl. It's perfect for my 55 lb dog but I think it would be perfect for any size dog since the bowl is totally adjustable....large or small. It can be used for food or for water and has a handy clip to be able to carry a water bottle which is perfect for long walks or hiking. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: D. West

customer_reviews.title: Broke Easily, Seller Promptly Replaced It
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED: I had initially given this product a 1 star review, because one of the collapsable folds tore within 2 months of receiving it, despite careful use and handling. When I contacted the seller, they promptly responded, noting their product had a 1 year warranty, and sent me a replacement, at no cost. Upgrading to 4 stars for the excellent service! ORIGINAL REVIEW: I had really high hopes for this. First few times I used it, it worked great! Used less than a dozen times, since purchasing it in May 2020, and it is already broken! Despite not being rough with it, one of the collapsible folds has a tear in it! Absolutely unacceptable!
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Cracked at the creases in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: I like the beautiful blue color and thought this would be fine since the positive reviews seem to outweigh the negative ones. Wrong. Within four or fewer weeks it cracked at several of the seams where it collapses. I wanted to reach out to the company for a replacement, but there does not seem to be any way to do so. Unfortunately, I didn't notice it was falling apart until just after the return window. Waste of money. :( I have had a Prima Pets collapsible bowl for years and have not had similar issues, so it's not a phenomenon with collapsible silicone bowls. This Bonza one is just garbage.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bowl
customer_reviews.text: The nice wide base on this, as well as the ability to use it as either a shallow or deep bowl makes it very useful for my Dobie. She gets enthusiastic about water breaks, and this bowl manages to not get tipped over when she's being silly. it is a good size for my backpack, and it cleans up easily. I like that having a nice bowl make me look more pulled together when we're at restaurants or coffee shops, too!
customer_reviews.author: ilyandra

customer_reviews.title: Great for our evening walks
customer_reviews.text: I insert a bottle of cold water to the fob on the clip and attach that and the bowl to the end of the leash and off we go. I have found that I do not even have to remove the bottle of water to pour it into the bowl when I stop to give the boys a drink on our walks. The bowl collapses easily and we continue on our way. I have two Frenchtons with short noses, and this bowl has been a lifesaver for us on walks. Thanks for making such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: PameliaSue

customer_reviews.title: Holds plenty of water!
customer_reviews.text: This conveniently flattenable bowl with its nifty clip for attaching it to a belt loop or backpack strap is the perfect solution to long thirsty hikes with my canine pal, Zack. I carry a half-gallon bottle of water, and I dole it out to Zack every 20 minutes or so, depending on the weather and the steepness of our climb. Whatever he leaves in the bowl, I can splash on my head and neck -- and his -- to cool us down. Great design!
customer_reviews.author: kathleen lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Well-made product from quality materials.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a "two bowl" set for less than what this one bowl cost. Worthless crap that fell apart in less than 2 days. This bowl is large, made from good materials and has already lasted longer than the others. It was more costly but I think it's a case of "...get what you pay for." Once you handle it, you can feel the durability and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Don MarcosTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love this bowl
customer_reviews.text: we have two dogs, both 50 pounds, and we travel and hike frequently. This bowl is light weight and works well for both dogs as it expands to two sizes. Love the fact that it can be washed in the washer. So much better than the older cloth bags as they eventually would leak. Fits easily into a glove box and hangs well on a backpack. The blue color makes it easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!!!
customer_reviews.text: We had a collapsable dog dish before, but lost it on a trip. We were bummed!!! When we saw this, we didn't hesitate to buy it. WE LOVE THIS DISH!!! The material is soft and pliable. It has a water bottle attachment (simple but brilliant). We take this with us when we take our 10 year pittie on long walks, he appreciates it! I appreciate that it is very easy to travel with! I would buy this again in a heart beat and would highly recommend this to any dog owner.
customer_reviews.author: chicken lips

customer_reviews.title: great bowl
customer_reviews.text: i bought this bowl, and use it every day at the dog park. i really like it, it holds a good quantity of water, and my dog and well as others drink out of it multiple times every day. it is duable, as some of the dogs sometimes use it as a toy, and no leaks so far. i like the collapsible aspect as i just hook it to my water bag/bottle so it goes when i take my dog out.
customer_reviews.author: Horror/SciFi  lover

customer_reviews.title: Must have for your pet!
customer_reviews.text: Every dog owner should have this bowl. We can enjoy the outside either on the deck, porch, or patio and always know our pet will have fresh water. We take it on walks, lightweight, hooks on my jeans and is just a great product. Love the personalized touch message by the owner. Well made and you can hook the water bottle right to it.
customer_reviews.author: Snap

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bowl is exactly as described. Just what we need for a 12 hour road trip with our golden retriever! We love it, and so does Sunny! She has already tried it out. Also, we received a great email from Bonza with tips for use, that were very helpful. That was both unexpected and helpful. Much appreciated. We will definitely buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes this bowl!
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured and represented. This is my fourth, and last, safe collapsible dog bowl! Perfect size for larger dog(s), the coated top is very easy to clean (much easier than the rubber ones), and the way it's weighted keeps it from tipping over from the weight of the carabiner even before you add water - then again when the bowl nears empty. My dog likes the extra 'face room' even though she will usually only drink a little - easy to manage by just unfolding to one crease! I just hate that it's manufactured in China - hence the 4 stars (we can do this in the US!)
customer_reviews.author: Meg W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size for 2 Large dogs to Share
customer_reviews.text: I use this on hikes on long walks to make sure my 2 large pups have water in the desert heat. This bowl is durable, light weight and is just the right size for our water breaks along the trail. The size can be a little irritating bouncing against my leg, but that would exist with any bowl that doesn't fold up (and those are pretty much destroyed after a few uses). It's durable enough to set out as a food bowl when we travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on the go water bowl
customer_reviews.text: Just got this to take on walks and training sessions with our GSD. She runs "hot" so being able to offer her water on the go means we can take longer walks, hikes and outdoor training. It's big enough so she can get a good drink yet collapses. The clip is very useful and because it is silicon, most water left in shakes out. It washes up well too. I would purchase this again and recommend it to others who have large breed dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Heidibell

customer_reviews.title: Great capacity and functionality!
customer_reviews.text: Really like the capacity of this bowl. Most collapsible bowls are small. This is perfect to carry when I take my ridgeback out for long walks. And the carabiner and bottle attachment are added bonuses. Only wish it came in other colors. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outings with my 80-pound labrador retriever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this portable dog bowl and carry it on outings with my 80-pound black labrador retriever! Our outings are very active, and in warm weather, I carry chilled water for my four-pawed friend. Halfway through our vigorous outings, my dog loves to rest on the grass in the shade, panting, tongue hanging out, and slurping up a refreshing drink. On really hot days, she enjoys dipping a paw into her bowl after drinking her fill! The carabiner enables me to carry this bowl on my waist-pack for hands-free fun!
customer_reviews.author: L. Morey

customer_reviews.title: Large and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for my St Bernard. Granted, he drains them in one try but they are so easy to use and store. I am going to carry them in my car from now on. Except for splashes he didn't spill either bowl. I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnne Bevard

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have a lab and she full of energy.... when we are out hiking and traveling she always need a drink... the doggie bowl just fit her needs prefect.. and mine... it easy to connect to Day pack or my pants... she a happy lab
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes to go for long walks, but with he heat and humidity, she gets thirsty. With a bottle of water and this bowl, it easy to stop and give my dog a drink of water. The bowl is sturdy and does not leak. This bowl is a great product and exactly what I needed for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Quality product that has many uses
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very well made! We use the bowl for our new puppy Sadie. I bought one to try for water and we like it so much I’ll returning the one I bought from another company and ordering a second one to have for her dry food as well as the one for water. I like the collapsiblality of bowl and the ability to not pop out the entire bowl if it’s not all needed. We’ve taken it to the park and hiking so far, no issues. I also liked the carabiner and silicone adapter to put over the water bottle neck to keep everything together, great idea. Thanks for a great product! Kevin
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN D

customer_reviews.title: Portable bowl works great!
customer_reviews.text: This bowl suits my purposes. I go on walks with my dog and this bowl is easy to clip on my dog pouch so I have it handy whenever we pass a drinking fountain. Easy to fill, use, and collapse when we get moving again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sly

customer_reviews.title: It'great!!
customer_reviews.text: It's great. The size is perfect for our big boy. It is deeper which helps prevent his sloppiness while drinking and he likes it. It still folds up like the smaller ones. Quality seems very good. A great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Crager

customer_reviews.title: Is essential
customer_reviews.text: Think I rated this before but - hey this is not only great but necessary! While walking - to give your dog some water, while traveling it’s essential I had a similar one before but this is so much better quality.... thank you!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice size sturdy trail bowl for a large dog. My only complaint is that the clip that comes with it, is junk and broke right away. However, carabiner type clips are inexpensive and the bowl is very functional.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Plenty big enough for our dog
customer_reviews.text: We have an Australian Cattle Dog, This bowl is big enough for her to get her nose in the bowl without hitting her whiskers on the sides. The amount of water it holds is plenty for her. I'd recommend it. We really like it! We got it really fast, too. Thanks so much! I will order it again if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: grandma

customer_reviews.title: there might be a better product out there
customer_reviews.text: I carried my old foldable fabric dog bowl on my pack for many yrs. where it would get snagged on catclaw and cactus. Then I thought,by now, there might be a better product out there. Eureka! Now both my thirsty desert dogs can drink simultaneously. The only feature I'd modify/add is a pour spout/groove on lip. ( Any left over water gets poured back into water bottles so as not to waste a precious drop.) Great product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: good for hikers
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product at this new purchase time 5 stars. however, depending on how long this bowl remains serviceable will determine how many stars after at least a year+ of daily use. if I get a year's service is acceptable as I use this daily hiking with 3 canines.......
customer_reviews.author: arizonadeserttom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a large dog, we go out on long walks every day. This water bowl is great. I like the fact that it can collapse to different sizes. Cleans easily, comes with well made hardware. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Just got this bowl the other day and was super excited to bring it to the dog park with us. My dog grabbed and carried it for a few seconds and the bottom of the bowl broke off... eyeroll. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for dog walks and when we take our dogs to the beach. It is very easy to clean and straps right onto our cooler or backpack. The bottle holder is a really cool feature as well. The dogs love it of course!
customer_reviews.author: RedGoldenGirl

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  Functions well for its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: One needs to be careful with it as in an effort to keep it easily collapsible and easy to store, if not handled carefully when moving or placing it with water in it, a side can easily collapse, spilling water. It needs a way to stay stable in such conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha Dog

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great for long walks with my German Shepherd. I haven't had it that long but it seems durable. The pictures show how it fits on her pack very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Rjacobs

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: I have two large dogs that we take to a dog park as often as possible. Numerous dogs have shared this bowl without it being an issue. The bowl stands up without collapsing which was my biggest concern I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Hein

customer_reviews.title: Like It - Haven't Used It Yet
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting a puppy later this week and purchased this collapsible bowl to bring out and about with us so he would have an easier experience than trying to drink out of a water bottle (and less water waste). I'm excited for him to try it. I have heard since purchasing this that plastic can sometimes give dogs outbreaks in acne. Crossing my fingers this product doesn't do that. I'm satisfied with both the size and color - I ordered in blue.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great for road trips and fits behind front seats of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made, handy collapsible bowl. Great for road trips and fits behind front seats of my car in netted misc. pouches. The only issue I have is even though these are titled 'large' bowls, the opening is only 7 inches diameter when unfolded. I have a Pyrenees and Newfoundland and they can barely fit their mouths into the dish to drink water. I hope they will soon make a 'Jumbo' size with a 9 in opening.....please!
customer_reviews.author: Beach Girl

customer_reviews.title: One of the best collapsible bowls
customer_reviews.text: These are the easiest collapsible bowls to use. They open and close easily but stay open when needed. Some of the others brands that I tried seem to close too easily and they close as the dog is drinking. These also hold a good amount of water and are deep enough for the dog to be able to get a good drink. I bought extra so we can keep them in our cars.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Developed a leak within 10 months
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't used often but it still ripped and developed a leak within 10 months. Looking for a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Nick V. Ibanez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect for our Labrador. I was worried it might collapse on him but it works great and hold the perfect amount. Very light weight and portable
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We have a new rescue, a Bluetick Coonhound. She loves long walks. We absolutely love the Bonza collapsible dish for her water, and the holder for a water bottle. It's so convenient and easy to take on our walks to keep her hydrated. I might mention that we live in Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bowl for big dogs/pups
customer_reviews.text: This bowl was just right for our 10 week old German Shepherd. I was worried it was going to be too big to carry around my belt or too small my pup wouldn't be able to drink out of it comfortably. But it was perfect. It has a little weight to it which I like because it means it's well made and sturdy. The hole to hold the water bottle is a nifty touch.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Recommend with no reservations.
customer_reviews.text: Bowls are great. Had another brand and like these just as well. Dogs definitely also! Don't use water bottle hanger so can't testify to that. But clips and bowls plenty sturdy. Loved the look of my original khaki canvas bowl bug just didn't work for them. Hard to get in. These absolutely accessible and since they were kind enough to point out half-extension, that's all I need to use for my multiple drinks per walk twosome.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Thin material between the ribs
customer_reviews.text: The product is light weight and easy to carry. Easy to pull apart and use. My dog is able to drink from it without any problems. The reason I gave it 4 stars, the material between the ribs is extremely thin. I had read several reviews stating this and that it had torn easily, but I went ahead and bought it. I'm not sorry because it is a good size, I just dont think it's going to last very long because of the thinness.111
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go
customer_reviews.text: Love this dog cup for bringing on my walks! Perfect size and great quality. A little more expensive than others on the market but I think this one will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great bowl for walking my dog!
customer_reviews.text: This bowl is perfect - it's light weight, attaches to my walking pack, opens for the dog to drink, then collapses and goes right back on the pack! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: KAP

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Water Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Part that fits over water bottles got stuck. Not a big deal, just use the same water bottle and refill it. But that part could have been made a little better. Otherwise this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: XLNT FOR CAR STORAGE
customer_reviews.text: We keep ours in the car, since the dog travels with us most places. It is always handy for water after a workout or food during an extended outing. Stores flat, fits in a small space. Doggie loves it, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra W.

customer_reviews.title: Great on the go collapsible
customer_reviews.text: My dogs hiking savior, clips right to my backpack. Quality is well made, built to last as long as you don't let your dog chew it.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore Benne

customer_reviews.title: Must have for beach and hikes
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Highly recommend for anyone who takes their pup to the beach or on long hikes it makes things so convenient and adds almost 0 weight!
customer_reviews.author: Erica B. Turansky

customer_reviews.title: Great bowl!
customer_reviews.text: This collapsible bowl makes it so easy to take with us on the go! It's sturdy, easy to pop up and to flatten, and we bring it whenever our dog goes out with us. I definitely recommend this product to dog owners!
customer_reviews.author: pma24

customer_reviews.title: Drink up
customer_reviews.text: Really like that fact that it adjustable, light weight and seems to be well built. Used it twice now and have no complaints. Our boy likes it too.
customer_reviews.author: Arcat

customer_reviews.title: much bigger than I realized
customer_reviews.text: I should have looked at dimensions because the bowl is quite large. It is easy to only open a small amount to provide water on the trail. Works well and well made.
customer_reviews.author: femchemeng

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for days in the park
customer_reviews.text: This is great for days in the park with our large dog. it can stretch over a water bottle with the rubber bone, which is neat, but we usually just use the carabiners to clip it to our backpacks.
customer_reviews.author: Eric W.

customer_reviews.title: So versatile!
customer_reviews.text: We (my dog and I) love this bowl! Whether you use it for food or water, it holds plenty. Yet when you are down it folds flat and is easy to store. The color is beautiful as well! I purchased this because our dog likes to join us on long boat rides so it's perfect to just throw in my beach bag and then pull it out, expand it, and fill with water when he gets thirsty. I also really like the water bottle carrying attachment! How convenient. Highly recommend for the size/quality/price. Very good deal -- would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Savanna

customer_reviews.title: They thought about my dog's needs
customer_reviews.text: Sarada is a rescue that loves car rides! I use the Bonza large bowl when we're out and about. It's perfect! Can't wait to use the carabeener hook when I take her on a hike. Cleans easily. Love the adjustable collapsible feature to accommodate different amounts and also prevent spillage.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Lombardi

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This bowel is of quality material and should last three times longer than one of the other discounted fold-up bowels we had that after a few uses the bowel cracked and split at one of the folds.
customer_reviews.author: Rollin Coggan

customer_reviews.title: It is as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, everything is and works as described. Only used the bowl once during a long hike. Beats the doggie bag I used to pour water in for my pups while in long walks/hikes. I hope it keeps up with them.
customer_reviews.author: Oana

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bowls! We bought them for when we travel and love them! They are sturdy and do not collapse when we have food and water in them but collapse nicely when we want to store them! Will purchase again and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Handy!
customer_reviews.text: This is so handy for long trail walks - in addition to be collapsible, it attaches right to the water bottle! Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Van

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Dog Bowl!
customer_reviews.text: We love using this bowl for our Labrador because it holds a full bottle of water and is deep enough for her to put her face down in it. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't take up a lot of space for its size.
customer_reviews.text: Quick and describe perfectly. My daughter likes it and says it should work great. Nice size others were just too small.
customer_reviews.author: Misha D. Laws

customer_reviews.title: This is my “walk the dog” water bowl!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I clip it to my fanny pack and take it with me when I walk the very big giant schnauzer. LOVE it, recommend it and would buy it again. Phyllis
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Great to have for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product to have in the car in order to water our GSD on a recent trip! We'll continue to use it when he travels with us.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far a durable bowl that I can jog with.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Golden Retriever, so I thought this one was a good size for her so far everything has been great with the bowl. At first I questioned the part that holds the water bottle, but I used it with a 16 oz bottle. I was doing a slight jogging pace and it held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: John Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Big bowl for a big dog
customer_reviews.text: We have a large Mastiff and this bowl works good for him to get water when we are out. All of the little silver clips have broken off on all of our collapsible bowls when he shakes. I keep it in the car with a solid jug of water. If you want it on your dog, buy a better solid latch.
customer_reviews.author: Lee43

customer_reviews.title: Came quickly and as described
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son's dog so I personally haven't used it. It is exactly as described and come quickly. Collapsed easily. Big enough for a large dog but not too big so that you're wasting water when you get back on the trail after each stop.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Actual color is true to what is pictured. I’ve only had this for a month or so but seems to be much better quality than bowls I’ve purchased in the past.
customer_reviews.author: calidreemer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. The bottle holder design and clip are very convenient. Very pleased with the seller and service.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bowl!
customer_reviews.text: You can easily adjust to multiple sizes - good for either larger and smaller dogs! Quick shipping and just want we wanted!
customer_reviews.author: JSMK in West Chester, OH

customer_reviews.title: perfect bowl for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I really liked that the bowl came with a ring that fits on a water bottle so i can hook it on. Then you know that's the doggie water. We take our Irish Setter out with us in our side by side and she gets really thirsty. This is the perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Convenience !!!
customer_reviews.text: My girl Cady and I love her new collapsible dog bowl ... it is so convenient to collapse it, clip it to my belt, add a water bottle and off we go for a walk. I no longer have to worry about her getting thirsty before we get back to the car or back home. Love it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna J.

customer_reviews.title: Great collapsible bowl
customer_reviews.text: Great bowl to take to the dog park. My dog is a water snob and will not drink in the common watering hole 😊
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary C.

customer_reviews.title: Handy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love the collapsible bowl. The hook to attach it isnt very sturdy, and lost that on the first walk, luckily notided quickly and didnt lose the bowl. Got a better hook and now this stays on my pack to easily reach for use
customer_reviews.author: Dominick Marinelli

customer_reviews.title: 4 big dogs size
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bowl for my crew of 4 big dogs. It is a great bowl. The carabiner failed quickly as it is not made for everyday use. I have better carabiners and replaced it. Otherwise, it' great.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Tolton

customer_reviews.title: This bowl is amazing quality! I needed a bigger one than you ...
customer_reviews.text: This bowl is amazing quality! I needed a bigger one than you can buy at most pet stores, I have a 55 pound husky and a baby Rottsky that will be 80-110 pounds so I needed a real bowl not a tiny one! The bottle holder attached is also a great feature! It’s easy to wash & easy to take with you, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dareyn

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size! We used it when we picked up our puppy. Will be great for walking him.
customer_reviews.author: Cfrosty

customer_reviews.title: Large enough for a giant breed
customer_reviews.text: Tony my Saint Bernard gets enough water in one filling. Best thing I have bought for him!
customer_reviews.author: MacGregor

customer_reviews.title: Very Nifty!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had known about it sooner! I have seen other pet owners with it but I thought it was a frisbee. It's perfect for my 2 year old Great Dane.
customer_reviews.author: Arcticwinter

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product that will hold up to its use. I had received another similar item the same week and it was clear the difference in quality. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great dog bowls for great value.
customer_reviews.text: Use these bowls while hiking and in my doggie supply kit in my truck. Very compact, easy to clean, large enough for 100lb dogs to drink. Live the bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Sano

customer_reviews.title: Great travel dish!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I keep this in my car for when we are out and about!! Great size, easy to store and carry!
customer_reviews.author: Ann-Marie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dog bowl
customer_reviews.text: This is actually our second bowl. We liked the first one so much we bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Christoph

customer_reviews.title: Travel Dog Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Your Bonza Large dog bowl that collapses works great!! It is easy to use and is compact.
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: will buy a 2nd one!
customer_reviews.text: Like the size. Made of sturdy flexible material. Good water bowl for my 45lb dog
customer_reviews.author: Jeep Girl

customer_reviews.title: ALWAYS BE READY FOR YOUR PRECIOUS PET!
customer_reviews.text: I have this in my car at all times so if my pet needs a drink I have a great bowl to put it in. I love it & it fits right in the pocket of my back seat.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for road trip
customer_reviews.text: Our rescue pups love the convenience of the collapsible bowl for road trips
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Does its job on the trail. I bit fussy to fold down. We'll see how durable it is.
customer_reviews.author: Syrinx09

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 60 lb German Shepherd mix and this is the perfect bowl to take on our long walks in the Texas heat. I love that it can be expanded to different sizes. And the fact that it comes with a clip that can fit over a water bottle is a nice bonus! Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: LibAnne

customer_reviews.title: Well made, high quality rubber bowl
customer_reviews.text: Carry this dog bowl in my car. Takes up no space and is very convenient. Love it
customer_reviews.author: robert vernava

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent travel bowl! We got the large bowl. It easily fits over generic water bottle. Great for hikes or even just long walks around town. Fast shipping. Great follow up to make sure we are happy with our purchase. Would buy again from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Norwood

customer_reviews.title: junk!
customer_reviews.text: after a few months the bowl separated and split open at the collapsible areas! now its useless....
customer_reviews.author: joletgo

customer_reviews.title: Crazy dog
customer_reviews.text: ... even after putting it through the dishwasher my dog won't drink out of it
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Big Bowl for Big Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have a puppy that is 20 weeks old an already hitting around 50 lbs. I needed a bowl big enough that his mouth can get easy access to water when we go for walks or have puppy playtime and this has been great. Giving it four stars because I have only had it for a couple of weeks and want to leave room for the unknown. :)
customer_reviews.author: jennica

customer_reviews.title: Great for trsveling
customer_reviews.text: Love it, my dog loves it; great for auto trips and hiking, bottle holder is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: patrick d slattery

customer_reviews.title: Convenient way to keep my furry pal hydrated
customer_reviews.text: The Bonza collapsible bowl is just what I needed for walking, hiking, and traveling with my dog. It's lightweight and easily clipped to a belt loop or carried in a backpack. Expands and collapses easily, and depth of expansion is easily adjusted for different needs. I use it for both food and water. My dog is happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally, I found the perfect collapsible water bowl
customer_reviews.text: The water bowl was even better than I thought it would be. It is a good grade of rubber and collapses easily. This will be great for our walks.
customer_reviews.author: Groovy Librarian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 2 large dogs. I love the feel and durability.
customer_reviews.author: DAS

product_meta.title: Bonza Large Collapsible Dog Bowl, Hiking Dog Bowl for Large Dogs, Lightweight, Sturdy, Leak Proof, Food Safe, Premium Quality Travel Pet Bowl Solution
feature_bullets: WILL NOT EASILY COLLAPSE when filled with food or water or break when dropped, BUILT TOUGH making it perfect for large dogs.
COMPLETELY SAFE eco-friendly non-slip portable dog bowl. FDA approved and 100% BPA free. Sturdy Durable and Lightweight.

TAKES UP VIRTUALLY NO ROOM and easy to store. Dimensions are 7" diameter and 3" height when fully expanded or .75" height when collapsed. Holds either 16oz or a LARGE 40oz capacity when fully expanded. Ideal bowl for medium to large dogs.
EASY TO FEED AND WATER YOUR DOG on the go with bonus water bottle holder. Clip your dogs water bowl and a bottle to your bag, belt or leash.
DISHWASHER SAFE FOR EASY CLEANING. A perfect companion for parks and walks and the ideal foldable dog bowl set for around the home or anywhere. Discover the ultimate dog travel bowl today.
